-e ---

# mind

𓄣 ment

𓄣 𒊩𒅗 mi₂dug₄ mind care

deem 𒁶𒈠 𒁆𒈠 dimma #ţēmu dämmer denk

𒂄 #mindê ≈ 𓏠 𓈖 𓃒 𒂄 zu7 ≈ 𒍪 zu "sei" "as if" 𒐊𒄄𒅔 i.gi₄.in 𒂄 "then again" ⇔

𒀀𒆳 a-mat mãt mind "will" @ mount 𒆳

宓 mì mind ≈ 心 mián @ 必 bì 𓆤

𓂓 KA 𓇉𓏏𓄣 heart, mind ⋍ 𓄡 ከርሥ karś كرش kerš karaš …
𓄡 "stomach, mind" karassu karassun karaš karašī karšuʾa karšukka karšuya : ከርሥ karś كرش kerš
𓄡 ka-ra-as-su; ka-ra-sún; ka-ra-ši; ka-ras-sún; ka-raš; kar-as-su; kar-šu-u-a; kar-šu-uk-ka; kar-šú-u-a.
𓄡 𒅗𒊏𒊍𒋢; 𒅗𒊏𒄢; 𒅗𒊏𒅆; 𒅗𒊕𒄢; 𒅗𒊕; 𒋼𒀀𒊍𒋢; 𒋼𒀀𒋗𒌋𒀀; 𒋼𒀀𒋗𒊌𒅗; 𒋼𒀀𒋟𒌋𒀀

𒊩𒅗 mi₂dug₄ mun.dug "mind" to care for, treat well, treat kindly <> mild

𒉌 NI mu5 mu₅ มัน mina man minyak "oil" 𒉌𒄄𒅔𒍪 #mindê mind “as if” i₃-gi4-in-zu

𒉇 NAM₂ 𒌋𒌋 MAN "lord" 𒉇 NAM₂ mens mind (fore)thought, plan(ning); understanding; instruction

𒉣𒈨𒋳 #šipru #mūdū му́дар múdar "knowing, wise"

𓇋 𓏶 𓅱 𓏥 𓄡 𓏏 𓏤 | thoughts |

μανία mânie mania mad rage *mn̥yétor √mind 𒅺 murgu₃ murgu ma.rage mageba in გაშმაგება gašmageba

𓇋 𓅱 𓐍 𓅓 𓂜 | ignorant | 𓅱 𓐍 wren.k ≈ wrong 𓅓 𓂜 m.nt ≈ ment
